output.sentences: Our town is holding its annual festival.
Every time festival arrives the streets are packed with kids.
The title on the stall alerted us that the produce inside was organic and fresh-picked.
I have to say we had an amazing time.
We shopped and had a great picnic lunch and were very ready to rest by the end of the afternoon.
